config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code is a method that returns the default font family. It first checks if the font family is set in the hints, if not, it falls back to the super class method.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the getDefaultFontFamily method is called in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option is limited to the font family setting for the application, affecting the visual appearance of text displayed.
